description:
No matter how often Alma explains that sorcerers and ordinary humans don`t understand each other, Seth just can`t accept it. So, to stop people from seeing sorcerers as the bad guys, Seth swears to destroy all the Nemesis. To do this, he decides to go to Radiant, a land of legend where the Nemesis` nest is said to be. Exasperated by his recklessness, Alma warns him against it, but the two can`t see eye to eye. That night, Alma recalls the time she and Seth first met...
Source: crunchyroll
